attributes.additional_details:
Despite the fact that TB rates in cattle have increased in the areas of the 2018 cull, it's been expanded to cover 11 more areas and kill 50% more badgers.
https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/tb-cows-cattle-badger-cull-gloucestershire-prorogue-vets-a9098366.html

A government-appointed review led by Sir Charles Godfray said that TB transmission was greater from cattle to cattle and that farmers should do more to prevent the spread.
attributes.background: Badger culling is ineffective - rates of TB in cattle went up by 130% in key cull areas in 2018. It's also immensely cruel, at least 9k badgers took more than 5 minutes to die in the last cull. Furthermore, with 63,000 badgers due to killed in the current cull, we're pushing them to extinction.
